TITLE: Hey! I'm
SUBTITLE: BSc Computer Sciences
TEXT1: I want to tell you a bit about me. I was born in Haifa (Israel), but came a bit later to Switzerland and grew up here. During this time I developed some skills: my curiosity and my perseverance. In result I like all challenges in life from small ones like a good old Sudoku to popular ones like the zebra puzzle. Board- and cardgames of every description fascinate me. Read more about my career and use the opportunity to contact me.
TIMELINENODE1-DESCRIPTION: Next to my study I work at Swisscom as an internship. So far I worked on the following projects:
TIMELINENODE1.1: NetnearIT: RubyonRails - developed web application for automated network operations
TIMELINENODE1.2: VicoTV: React Native & intrapreneur - project lead of an internal startup and frontend developer of an mobile application with React Native
TIMELINENODE2-DESCRIPTION: At the FFHS (Fernfachhochschule Schweiz) I study until 2021 for my BSc in computer science. For my special field I chose Data Science, because I want to lead my career in this direction.
TIMELINENODE3-DESCRIPTION: PowerUser is a TechSupport at the KS Seetal. My main task was the setup of exam-evironments from a bootable stick on every student's laptop, as well as install printing- and presenting-softwares. I supported the students in all of their questions belonging to their laptops.
TIMELINENODE4-DESCRIPTION: I graduated at the KS Seetal (CH) with the focus on the subjects biology/chemistry and computer science.
